### Lecture 01 (Sept. 07, 2017)

---

##### Register a GitHub account - Do this first! 

Register for a free individual account at [GitHub](https://github.com/). I will need your usernames to add you to the main repository in github - [Programming for Data Analysis Fall 2017]( https://github.com/PDA-NYU-Fall-2017). I will give your own private repositories where you'll deposit ("push" in git language) your classwork and homework for this course. Discussion among us for this course will be done at the [Discussion page](https://github.com/PDA-NYU-Fall-2017/Discussion/issues). You may also raise questions and issues by clicking "New issue" tab in this page.

##### R and RStudio

You can install R from its source page <a href="https://www.r-project.org/"target="_blank"> here</a>. I would suggest installing the precompiled binary for your OS.
